data.name: Chickenoidz Super Party
data.detailed_description:
Discord


About the Game

►THE BIG SHOWDOWN OF THE SMALL CHICKS◄

Play 10 minutes battles with other players. It’s perfect for a fun get-together with friends or an epic online battle against the players from all over the World. Get use of AI as a backup option

►NOT ALL THE MUTATIONS ARE HARMFUL◄

Try the secret DNA formula and become the fierce chicken jock. Scatter the other chicken, use the ultimate ability for mass attack, destroy anything around you, try how it feels to be a huge monster

►DO NOT GET READY - FIRE◄

Use the whole armory of the non-lethal weapons - from the water gun to the slingshot throwing chicken eggs. Just grab your gun and shoot other chickens!

►GET READY FOR THE SURPRISE◄

Stun with a hammer, punch with a boxing glove, move around with a pocket teleport - this is an incomplete list of special moves available in the game. Take your opponent by surprise and don’t be tricked yourself

►NOT ONLY CHICKS ARE DANGEROUS◄

Look down and around. Mind the traps on the map, as they can both cut your path to victory, or become a tool for eliminating your enemy

►LANDSCAPES FOR EVERY TASTE◄

Throw the chicken battle at more than 20 different arenas including hot deserts, permafrost, a ruined castle and even a space station. Learn the weapons and traps on each of them. It is important not only to shoot accurately, but also to be able to use the features of the landscape

data.short_description: Chickenoidz Super Party - is a multiplayer top-down shooter for 1-4 players. You can play local or online. Get use of the wide armory and special features. Destroy the enemies and shot the arenas to pieces. Become the winner of the chicken PvP battle!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Vietnamese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Portuguese*, Turkish*, Japanese*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 560 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870 (DirectX-11 compliant with 1GB of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or better or AMD FX-8120 @ 3.1 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (or GTX 760 / GTX 960) or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (or R9 280x [2GB VRAM] / R9 380 / Fury X)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card 5.1 with latest drivers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.15
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core, 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 / RX 460
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 11.6
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (Most Linux distributions should work)
  • Processor: 2nd generation Core i3, AMD A6, or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD 5670, Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM4 1GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
